text: Sharma ji you know what I feel for you, maybe some others do but who cares but let's not go there kaafi logo ka dil tut jayega. But literally speaking all the time spent with you was invaluable. Most cheerful person of our group even in the worst of the times aur baaki aapke contacts ka kya kehna kabhi Laga hi nh exams mai padhne ki jarurat hai, we always had our hidden Ace with us. Bas ek choti si problem ho gyi aap double A kyu lagate nh toh aap bhi humare saath hote TA fir toh kya hi baat thi. Aapke saath mostly jo time nikla voh library mai hi tha and you were the reason mai library mai bhi kyu nh padh pata thaðŸ˜‚. Jaise hi mood banta padne ka aa jate the hasane. Baaki voh chai samosa breakâ¤ï¸. But kabhi tum bhi khila diye hote toh maza double hi ho jata. Will miss you so much bro...
author: Ayush  Goel

text: Arree abhijaat kotamkar urf jhaa2, kotu aur bhi boht naam hai but let's keep them with us log sun nh paengeðŸ˜‚. Tujhpe toh like bachpan se overpower krne ka soch rkha tha pehle bich wala bed diya gaya fir tono taraf se ghapaghap. Tere saath toh itni jageh ho aaya maybe no one knows you better. Time se dur dur tak koi relation hi nh koi kehta tha na time pe krna toh exactly vhi krta tha time pe like 10 bje deadline hai toh 9:59 pe start krtaðŸ˜‚. Baaki aapki harkate toh kya kehna yaad hai voh Andheri raat, kya bhaga tha room mai voh pehnne. Agar uss din ek min se late ho jata na toh khule aam izzat hi lut jaati. Aur hn gaali se problem hai apko kabhi khudke bolte suneðŸ˜‚. Yeh banda agar apne room pe nh hai na toh definitely kisi aur room pe pada so rha hoga. Aadhi Iitk jindagi toh tumne mere room pe bita di aur baaki Aadhi baakiyon ke. Tujhe room allot krne ki koi jarurat thi nh vese. Yaad hai jab Kharagpur jaane wale the kya chupchap se kone mai khada rha aur sunna mujhe pada. Pata nhi maine kitni baar tumhari vajeh se marvaayi hai. But thike in return I got such a great friend that was all worth it. Mai toh vaise hi badnaam ho gya tha wing mai tu aur bahar Shrotriya. Aur teri harkato ke baare batane baitha na puri book kam pad jaegi voh aapka bich raaste khadi train se utarkar dabba change krna bas ek hi dukh hai train chali kyu nh jyada maza aataðŸ˜‚. Baaki ek baat bta voh headphones laga ke pure time dolta rehta tha aur mundi hilata rehta tha kuch smjh mai aata tha bhi ya aise hi bich bich ek do shabd chilla deta tha hume darr lag jata tha bhut ghus gya kya isme. Yaad hai mukesh ko laat marke bhagana rafting ke time boht josh mai tha stream ki speed badte hi fatke 4 ho gyiðŸ˜‚. Yaar itna kuch kiya hai tere saath toh ki gina bhi nh skta chess, frisbee, football, volleyball, mafia, nightouts, movies, monopoly, fifa aur pata nh kitna kuch. Kitne course saath mai kare hai aur marvaayi haiðŸ˜‚. Boht saari memories hai tere saath toh milke Pandey ki maarna, najan ke saath chutiyaap krna aur mostly faltu ki bakchodi. Trips ki itni saari yaadein, canteen jana, maghne jana but fir vahaan bhi nautanki krna. Now thinking of that aadha time toh tune barbaad ke diya mera kamineðŸ˜…. If was the full crack of the group, you were not so far to meðŸ˜‚. Yaar sb online kyu ho gya yaar boht kuch miss kr diya ab pta nh kab free honge but saale bhul na jana mujhe baaki mai toh hu yaad dilane ke liye. Mujhe itni jaldi nh bhula paega. But yaar teri boht yaad aane wali. Keep in touch buddy aur boht kuch krna hai saath mai...
author: Ayush  Goel

text:
Pehle din se pure hall mai like sirf ek hi naam sunayi deta tha "Bakait". Matlab aap koi bhi club, course ya prof(specially CSEðŸ˜‚) soch lo aur Bakait ko nh pata ho aisa toh ho hi nh skta. Mtlb sent ke gen sec se jyada toh Bakait ko pta hoga kahaan kya chal rha like real godfatherðŸ™‡.  But iske alawa ek chiz ke liye aur famous the aap and I know you know what I am talking aboutðŸ˜‚ matlab tumhara pen bhi kho jaye tb bhi vahi krenge. Tumhara khauf tha bhayi puri wing mai. 
Baaki tumhare saath trip mai kaafi maza aaya there we all witnessed the real you. Tab toh laga Bakait se saath jaane ka mauka nh chodne wale. Uske alawa bhi kitna time spent kiya saath mai. Remember those matches baith kr cookies try krte rehte the koi toh mil jayeðŸ˜‚. Baaki har baar motivate krte rhe reality dikhake. Thanks for guiding me out when I was not focused enough. You are really good person bas voh wala factor thoda kam hota tohâ€¦ ðŸ˜‚
Nice to have meet you and fir milte trip pe, iss baar ek badi se krteðŸ˜‰
author: Ayush  Goel

text: Arree jain sir aapke baare toh kya hi kahe koi bhi kaam ho kaisa bhi kaam ho aapke pass aaiye nirash nh honge. Aap nh hote toh online sem mai na jane hum sb ka kya hota hai most importantly voh wala course jisme sb bethkar jain sir ke code ka wait krte the. Didn't have some big trips with you but had some day outs with you which were definitely few of the best memories of the college specially woh jab aapka sb auto mai wait kar rahe the and you were like bas ek. I don't know the true sense of TA course for us but it did make for me aapse milne ka mauka mila. Maybe that's few of the only things that I don't regret about doing TA courses. Its just tumhare saath koi trips pe nh jaa paya but we will someday. Will meet soon
author: Ayush  Goel

text:
"IITK ka baccha" matlab khelne kudne ki umar mai kya kya kr gye bhaiya hn but kya kr skte rajasthan se honaðŸ˜‚. Tumse sabse pehle mile the cc building mth ka baccha so serious ki koi dekhte hi kehe "dekh aise hote hai IITian" but jb jana toh tumhara bachpana pta chala. Pehli baar acche mulakat toh 1st year mai hui thi usse pehle pehle sirf afvaahein or tumhare chillakar bhagne ki awaaze hi suni thi kabhi izzat bachakar toh kabhi chappal haath mai lekarðŸ˜‚ uske  baad toh toh baccha piche hi pad gaya. Pura third year(jitna bhi iit mai thaðŸ¥º) Among us, mafia, monopoly aur pta nh kya kya khelte hi nikal diya. Pta hi nh chala time kab nikal gya.
Aur tumhari Chai talab control hui ya abhi chai ki chuski ke bina jindagi aage nh badhti. Chalo yeh toh thik hai but Udhaar ki jindagi jioge reee matlab jab dekho sbse ek chai maangte paye jaate chahe koi bhi canteen ho. Under ka asli faida toh tumne uthaya haiðŸ˜‚
Hall ka so called cult secretary kabhi pta bhi tha cult mai aata kya matlab genuinely kya sochke tumhe secretary banaya gaya. 
Accha yeh batao Library mai jo books chodke aate the yeh sochke ki firse jaake pdunga kabhi uss jaate bhi the mostly yhi bolte milte yrr library jaa rha bag lene dopahar ko chod aaya thaðŸ˜‚. Maltab kya nh kiya tumne, Proff ke saamne se class mai uthke chale jate aur mujhe leke jaate the seriously pdengeðŸ˜‚. Kitni baar toh class ke liye uthane aate par sala mujhe dhakka deke khud so jate bechare pandey ko heart attack aa gya hota 1-2 baar toh. Yrr but kaafi shi time bita yrr college mai koi course aisa nh hai jo saath mai na kiya ho tum nh hote toh mai ek bhi assignment acche se nh kr pata. Tumne kaafi motivate kiya library jaane aur padne ke liye kaafi course bachaye tumne. Kitni bhi chinta ho ya problem  hamesha muskurate aur kaam kuch kuch na krke nipta hi dete. Yaar yeh college ke liye end years mai I majorly missed all these time with you yaar banglore aa jao naa kitne kuch krna hai saath mai. I will miss you so much buddy...
author: Ayush  Goel

text: Arree sir aapko kese bhul sakte hai mth gawd ho aap toh atleast humare group. Koi bhi mth ka course pehla naam toh aapka hi aata tha Dhawal hai toh kya darr hai. Baaki kaafi mazak krte rehte sbko khush rkhne ki koshish krte. I remember you guiding me many times and even sometimes when I actually didn't need them but that shows your care>>3. Baaki library ke Halle yaad hai na, pakka 10-12 logo toh bhej diya hoga ghar humne shor krkeðŸ˜‚. You were the most entertaining and tension free person of the group. Matlab endsem ke liye call krke bulana padta tha ki sir kahaan ho aa jao fir bhi kehte the hn 5 min. But kuch bhi kaho you are an awesome Stay like this. Lets go for some trip soon...
author: Ayush  Goel

text: Thank you for helping me out with some company processes while I was late( actually too late) for that. By the way, I hope your art course ended up well as I don't think I am that good with such stuff. Didn't get to talk to you so much but the time I got was worth it. You made my life so easy in all the company processes in which you were assigned with me as a CoCo. Hope our path will cross again, all the best for your future.
author: Ayush  Goel

text:
Arrree pandey ji aapka toh "obviously ofcourse" likhna tha aapko kisi ko bhulane ki himmat hai kya "Placement nh lagwana kyaðŸ˜‚". Sbse pehle hostel ke room mai mile the dekh toh lage the bokaro ke ek sidhe se ladka but jo fir jo rang dikhaye mai colour blind hi ho gaya I remember the first day seeing you matlab itna jyda sidha kaise but you know looks are deceptiveðŸ˜‚. Uske baad toh kya hi din beete do ka group banake 3re ki marna which was mostly youðŸ˜˜ raat raat bhar ki mehfile and voh breathless wali raat. 1st year kab nikal gya pata hi nh chala. To have you as a roommate was one of the best decision of my life (although we made at last moment opting out others first) fir 2nd year mai dar dar bhatakke samman joda aur ek jhatke mai lut gya thanks to our beloved padosi. Aur batao ab alarm tum band krte ya koi bagal wale room se aata band krne voh bhi "obviously" har 5 minute baadðŸ˜‚. Vese sahi batau toh aise bacche ko toh ghar se bahar hi nikal duðŸ˜‚. Aur batao kaisa jata ab tumhara Mondey favourite day tha na tumhara. Boht stories batayi hai tumne mondey ki issi chakkar mai jhaa2 pure time apne room par pada rehta tha. Pandey you are awesome boht jyada help kari hai tumne meri literally from the day one aur placement ke time pe toh koi bhi problem ho everyone says just one thing "Pandey hai na" hn bas thode incentives saath mai supplementry the "ofcourse"ðŸ˜‚. Placement mai toh itna busy ho gye the like humari toh shart lgti thi pandey call uthayega ya nh but baad mai pta chala vahaan toh kuch Orr hi chalu hai like every day was mondey for youðŸ˜‚ joke apart thanks for helping all of us out of stress of placements. Baaki kitna kuch kiya hai humne saath mai Volleyball, badminton aur cricket and voh ml project kaise bhul skte "obviously ofcourse" sb kuch krne ke baad batate theaine yeh kiya dekhlo aur samjhloðŸ˜‚. Aur login wala abhi bhi avaialble hai kya 5 rupee boht jyada hai uske mai 3 dega batao dealðŸ˜‚. Mr. Mamamio bottle collector future ki sochke collect kr rhe the kya baad mai uske kaam aegiðŸ˜‚. It's really nice to have in my life, just hope we will meet soon aur ek trip bhi pending hai humari. 
P.s thoda time pe naha liya kro bechare najan ko kitni problem hoti thiðŸ˜‚
author: Ayush  Goel

text: Aur mukesh kaisi ho? Voh gana suna hai jab tak samose mai aloo tera rahunga oh meri shaalooooâ€¦ mast hai naðŸ˜‚. Or kesa chal rha aapka second space suna hai boht rangeen misaaj ke ho toh bas witness nh kr paaye thoda sa jaan leva hamla ho gayaðŸ˜‚. Bihar power ka pehla drashya first year mai dekhne ko mila Puri wing ko khauf mai rkha hua tha specially marathiyo ko. Yeh sb toh thik hai apne laptop ko toh chod dete apne prakop seðŸ˜‚. Fifa ke champion matlab pata nh kitni tricks sikh lo thi but mere through ball ka tod nh nikal paaye roz aate the aur oil ke jaate theðŸ˜‚. Volley nall mai uchal uchal kar ek haath se marta the net chodo court paar kr dete the baaki Badminton toh hai hi aapki speciality impossible shots bhi gir girke maar dete the aur simple se mai hug dete theðŸ˜‚. Vo sb toh thik hai Din mai chaar baar toh nahata hoge minimum room se jyada toh bathroom mai milte the aur towel kyu le jate the pouchte toh kbhi nh theðŸ˜‚. Dekhne wali chiz toh tumhari Meena aur najan ke saath ladai hoti thi. Duniya bhar ki Chinta krta the par kabhi unka nivaran kiya hai. Din mai room pe Raat ko chupchap se dabe paun lounge mai rang dikhate the. Jassa se akele bhid jata tha. Cycle tumhari duniya chalati thi aur uski chabbi ke liye dar dar ki thokte khate the but kabhi mana nh krte the Aur batao Horror movie dekhoge boht saari hai dekhne ko pandey ko bithaenge tumhare saath but yrr boht miss kr rhe tumhe Dil ka itna accha banda kahaan hi milega always help ke liye ready. Bas yeh batao agli trip par kab chalna
author: Ayush  Goel

text:
"Mr aticonfident najan'' from first year until last and the story will always continue, like itna confidence kahaan se laate. Matlab agar galat bhi karo na toh confidence ke saath. Pehli baar first year mai wing mai dekha tha that time I felt like yeh cse ka haiðŸ˜‚ but fir mila toh jana yrr chaapu toh boht hai aur confidence level toh beyond this world like akele hi pura bihar ko hila dalta. Agar kisi ne tera aur mukesh ka amna samna nh dekha toh kya hi dekha. Those epic fights, Aisa kabhi laga nh kya tujhe bodyguards rakh lene chahiye. Dhire dhire hum sabki baby ban gya maybe because of that moti __ you know what I am talking about.
Start humne fifa se kiya tha but fir voh fifa se football ka safar was awesome one still hum dono ko hi kuch khaas khelna nhi aata tha but still those were the things I missed most during the lockdown. Cleanliness ke itne saare pravachan deta but fir bhi humare room par hi pada rehta, I know we were the most irresistible people of the wing. Kitne din toh soke hi nikal diye honge tune like ek raat soya aur agle din jaaga. Kabhi confusion nh hua kya like aaj toh wednesday hai thursday nh. Bathroom jate mai hamare room par hamesha aana like pta nh acche pressure nh bnta tha kyaðŸ˜‚. Raat raat bhar ki panchayat aur voh bhi kisi bhi random topic pe like puri duniya ka faltu time humare pass hi hai. At last Itni mast trip halaki I was personally worried agar apke standards ko match kar paye ya nhi but fir jo trip nikli maza aa gya. Ab milte bangalore mai, room dekh lena koi accha sa. Fir toh har weekend party chalegiâ€¦
Until Next time...
author: Ayush  Goel

text:
My tinder king, matlab kitne nh kitne matches se satisfied honge aap log exponentially swipe krte hai aur aap matchðŸ™‡ bichari unhe toh pta bhi nh hoga kitni lambi line mai lage vohðŸ˜‚. Aisa lgta nh kya aap galat line mai aa gye. Matlab konsa talent nh hai aapme billiards khelte but finally scores mai aapse aage tha and the point is I don't know how. But badminton mai toh rehno do you can only beat me only if I forfietðŸ˜‚. 
Jokes apart yaar pehli baar branch ke through mile but fir toh kuch nh choda mtlb maghayi, khelna, bunk krna sb saath mai. Baaki aapki stats understanding (more importantly contactsðŸ˜‚) hats off, mtlb A se toh niche baat hi nh krte and I am being lenient on this like A* pakka. Aur talents ginane baithe toh book likh jaegi poori. But ek baat batao yeh alas ko kahaan le jaoge. "Yrrr mai toh nh kr rha yeh 2 page ka assignment chota mila toh thik nh toh amma miya mai chala Sone ''. Too relaxed yet completes all the works on time. Had a great time with you on the campus with all that games and nights at library ofcourse. Will miss all of that so much. Just hope we will meet soon and all the best for future.
author: Ayush  Goel
